name: @standalone/paima-engine
author: Paima Studios
description: Paima Engine standalone, aka executable binary wrapper around the engine core.

scripts.build:prod-binary: npm run build:prod-binary-macos && npm run build:prod-binary-linux
scripts.build:prod-binary-macos: npm run pack && ts-node ./scripts/package macos && mv ./packaged/tmp/@standalone/paima-engine-macos ./packaged/@standalone/
scripts.build:prod-binary-linux: npm run pack && ts-node ./scripts/package linux && mv ./packaged/tmp/@standalone/paima-engine-linux ./packaged/@standalone/
scripts.build:dev-binary: npm run build:dev-binary-macos && npm run build:dev-binary-linux
scripts.build:dev-standalone: npm run install-binaries && npm run build:dev-binary
scripts.release: npm run prepare:standalone && npm run build:standalone && npm run build:dev-standalone
scripts.standalone: npm run prepare:standalone && npm run build:standalone
